AppDB.Name: SCH_SCHEDULER_ENABLE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Is Scheduler Element enabled as scheduler.

AppDB.Name: SCH_FLOW_SHAPER_DYNAMIC_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the dynamic information about the shaper. Normally updated by HW

AppDB.Name: SCH_SHAPER_DESCRIPTOR_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the Shaper-Flow-Attributes,peak rate man/exp, max burst

AppDB.Name: SCH_SLOW_RATE_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains slow rates (presented as mantissa/exponent) per profile (A or B)

AppDB.Name: FLOW_SLOW_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table holds the slow status of flows/schedulers. For a flow the entry reflects the status of the ingress queue. For a scheduler the entry reflects wether it has a flow attached

AppDB.Name: SCH_SHARED_DRM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table describes device shared credit generator

AppDB.Name: SCH_CORE_DRM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table describes credit generator per core

AppDB.Name: SCH_BW_PROFILE_BIASING_PROBABILITY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the Uninstall, Replicate and Discard probability for the new RCI throttling mechanism per high/low, local/fabric and rci level

AppDB.Name: SCH_RCI_BIASING_MODE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the new RCI throttling mechanism mode : be Global(default)/dev-biasing/flow-biasing

AppDB.Name: SCH_FLOW_CREDIT_SRC_COS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains flow credit src cos attribute.

AppDB.Name: SCH_SE_CL_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Mapping from CL to the class profile

AppDB.Name: SCH_HR_IS_PORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Is HR used as port HR

AppDB.Name: SCH_PORT_HR_TO_TCG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Map each HR to TCG in port scheduler

AppDB.Name: SCH_FLOW_CREDIT_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the programmable credit counter per flow

AppDB.Name: SCH_PORT_CREDIT_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure the programmable credit counter per port

AppDB.Name: SCH_DSP_TO_HR_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Scheduler table for destination port to HR map

AppDB.Name: SCH_CREDIT_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Scheduler table for credit ounter configuration. used in diagnostics
